title: Mini Pappadams with Cilantro Chutney and Lime Pickle
directions: Heat oil in a 2-quart heavy saucepan over moderate heat until it registers 350°F on deep-fat thermometer. Fry pappadams in 3 batches until puffed and pale golden, 30 seconds to 1 minute, then transfer with a slotted spoon to paper towels to drain. (Return oil to 350°F between batches.)
Purée cilantro in a blender with jalapeño, water, brown sugar, lime juice, and salt. Transfer to a bowl and stir in yogurt.
Serve pappadams with chutney and pickle for dipping.
ingredients: 1/2 (7-oz) package mini pappadams (about 1 1/2 inches in diameter)
1 to 2 jalapeño chiles, seeded and coarsely chopped
Accompaniment: finely chopped lime or mango pickle
